about_the_game:
• Online Co-Op Multiplayer: Every decision affects the tribe. Plan and execute strategies collectively to ensure the survival and prosperity of your community.


  • Strategic Decision Making: Choose to stay with your friends for collective strength or isolate yourself to gain personal power.


  • Hand-Drawn Artistry: Explore a richly detailed world brought to life with stunning, hand-drawn animations that add depth and vibrancy to your adventure.



Team up with friends or players globally to face the challenges together. Work as a tribe to coordinate attacks, share resources, and strategize as you descend and fight harder hordes. The diverse mix of characters and abilities lets you build a powerful squad where each cloudstrider plays a unique role. Success relies on communication and a shared vision, as one wrong move could threaten the entire tribe.



Choose to stick together as a group providing valuable bonuses that amplify the entire team's potential. Strengthen each other’s skills through proximity, increasing your collective survivability and combat efficiency. Protective buffs, increased damage, and enhanced healing are just some of the benefits you'll receive. By moving in unison, your team can better face the relentless hordes and strategic challenges that await, ensuring the tribe remains stronger as a whole.



Choose to isolate yourself and gain individual strength. Face your fear and split up in a high-risk, high-reward strategy. Venturing off alone unlocks powerful solo upgrades and rewards that enhance personal capabilities, making you a formidable force. However, without the protective bonuses of sticking together, you'll need to rely solely on your skills and instincts to survive. This path rewards the bold and daring cloudstrider who seeks glory alone, knowing the risks and potential costs.



Ancient traditions and cutting-edge technology intertwine in a mystical land where your tribe, the cloudstriders, must rise above all to reclaim its rightful place. Generations ago, the sky was a realm of inspiration and unity, but now it is a battleground infested by relentless mechanical bugs and their regenerating overlord, Baphomet. The cloudstriders must band together, navigating strategic trials and fierce battles on their journey back to the village, where each choice shapes the tribe's fate. United by purpose and tradition, they strive to reclaim their heritage from the darkness and write a new chapter for their people.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Our Tribe Above All is an epic online co-op survival game that masterfully blends survivor combat with online multiplayer. Make crucial strategic decisions and choose to grow in power collectively or isolate yourself for individual gains while fending off relentless hordes.
